description: A pretty and quiet girl. She`s not good at socializing and never had a friend. In fact, Sayaka was not a child of the rich man`s house, but a child who turned out to be in debt and treated as a sex slave. She was used as a toy and trained in the secret social world where the rich gather from a very young age. She is an addict because she receives medication for many years.
name: Akimiya Sayaka
